data.what_is:
Get Butts in Seats for your next event.

Reach makes it easy for you to directly connect with your event's target audience. 

We know building the right audience for your business is hard. That's why Reach provides you access to a database of more than 379M contacts, and then automates outreach to that audience (so you can kick back and watch your registrations roll in).

Two easy steps to drive event ROI with Reach:

1. Provide Your Target Audience

Bye-bye junk leads. Define the criteria that matter most to you, and Reach will invite them via a multi-touch, multi-channel campaign.

2. Reach Fills the Room

A done-for-you multi-channel approach that fills your event, without you sending a single email. Reach takes care of the invites, and will register them for your event once they confirm attendance.

Leave the heavy lifting to us.

Learn more: https://www.banzai.io/banzai-reach
data.product_description: Reach enables you to reach and engage with new audiences to drive more awareness and attendance for your events, increase conversion rates, more effectively target your desired audience, and make the entire event marketing process more efficient.Banzai is bringing the next generation of event marketing automation technology to field, partner, and channel marketers.
data.positioning_against_competitor: Product DescriptionReach enables you to reach and engage with new audiences to drive more awareness and attendance for your events, increase conversion rates, more effectively target your desired audience, and make the entire event marketing process more efficient.Banzai is bringing the next generation of event marketing automation technology to field, partner, and channel marketers.Seller DetailsSellerBanzai International, Inc.Year Founded2015HQ LocationSeattle, WashingtonTwitter@getbanzai1,114 Twitter followersLinkedIn(r) Pagewww.linkedin.com89 employees on LinkedIn(r)BMOverview Provided by:Banzai Marketing

initial_reviews.review_title: I've Used Banzai at Multiple Companies
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Reach?
The customer service and support teams help you fuel success and result specific to your company.

What do you dislike about Reach?
The old platform was a little clunky, but the new overhauled UI is great!

What problems is Reach solving and how is that benefiting you?
Banzai has saved the day many times by boosting attendance increase attendance at events and webinars. More than once, they've helped get a key prospect into the room we've struggled to engage. I like that I can hyper-target by persona or vertical and also focus on my target accounts.

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about Reach?
review_question_answers.answer: The customer service and support teams help you fuel success and result specific to your company.

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about Reach?
review_question_answers.answer: The old platform was a little clunky, but the new overhauled UI is great!

review_question_answers.question: What problems is Reach solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: Banzai has saved the day many times by boosting attendance increase attendance at events and webinars. More than once, they've helped get a key prospect into the room we've struggled to engage. I like that I can hyper-target by persona or vertical and also focus on my target accounts.

initial_reviews.review_title: Accelerate & Create Quality Sales Pipeline with Marketing Events
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Reach?
Best tool for event management to generate a quality sales pipeline. The best part is you can easily manage your invitations with one tool using banzai's multi-channel outreach with your Ideal audience.

What do you dislike about Reach?
So far, I didn't have any issues with the system but the regular update of their product which, I find difficult to understand at once.

What problems is Reach solving and how is that benefiting you?
Go-to event marketing automation platforms we use in support of our partners. It is a simple and effective way to extend the reach of the great webinar programs our partners are running to help them develop opportunities and build pipelines.

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about Reach?
review_question_answers.answer: Best tool for event management to generate a quality sales pipeline. The best part is you can easily manage your invitations with one tool using banzai's multi-channel outreach with your Ideal audience.

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about Reach?
review_question_answers.answer: So far, I didn't have any issues with the system but the regular update of their product which, I find difficult to understand at once.

review_question_answers.question: What problems is Reach solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: Go-to event marketing automation platforms we use in support of our partners. It is a simple and effective way to extend the reach of the great webinar programs our partners are running to help them develop opportunities and build pipelines.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Reach?
Ease of interface. It's easy to set up a campaign and load in the assets. The support team is excellent and very communicative for making sure you set up your campaign to get the best results.

What do you dislike about Reach?
If you set up your campaign too late, your reach will be a toss-up. Make sure you set it up early (3+ weeks in advance). I also think this platform is better suited for driving attendance to virtual conferences than it is for one-off webinars.

Recommendations to others considering Reach:
Great platform for promoting virtual events

What problems is Reach solving and how is that benefiting you?
Overreliance on just a few channels (namely email and linkedin) to drive registrations. Banzai leverages email and also phone - which, who has time to make phone calls these days? Banzai does it for you.

initial_reviews.review_title: Banzai reach has changed the game!
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Reach?
I like what Bnazai Reach has done for what it is intended to aid in accomplishing which is to reach my audience for my various events. It makes reaching and engaging my desired audience much easier!

What do you dislike about Reach?
I haven't found anything that I don't like so far!

What problems is Reach solving and how is that benefiting you?
How simple reaching and engaging my desired audience is compared to what the process looked like previously.

initial_reviews.review_title: Spread your event to the World!!
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Reach?
Banzai helps you to target your desired audience. It helps you to know your people more and what they need. setting up the campaign is much easier.

What do you dislike about Reach?
It's helps you to get only online audience.

Recommendations to others considering Reach:
Customer support can be unhelpful most of the time.

What problems is Reach solving and how is that benefiting you?
Driving campaign of the events and targeting desire audience. Company products promotion is getting done with it on very large scale. Product launch events are managed by Banzai reach.

initial_reviews.review_title: A tool for segmented marketing outreach
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Reach?
The segmented audience and capability to run multiple campaigns for the same event.

What do you dislike about Reach?
No single Dashboard to track progress of these audiences. Also, not meant for all industries and geographies.
Allows outreach only for one try or of event - live/ondemand webinars which I find very restricting.

What problems is Reach solving and how is that benefiting you?
Outreach for events.
If you're don't want to invest in an inside sales team and you run a lot of events, it is worth investing in Banzai.

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about Reach?
review_question_answers.answer: The segmented audience and capability to run multiple campaigns for the same event.

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about Reach?
review_question_answers.answer:
No single Dashboard to track progress of these audiences. Also, not meant for all industries and geographies.
Allows outreach only for one try or of event - live/ondemand webinars which I find very restricting.

review_question_answers.question: What problems is Reach solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer:
Outreach for events.
If you're don't want to invest in an inside sales team and you run a lot of events, it is worth investing in Banzai.

initial_reviews.review_title: Generate event and webinar registration in your sleep.
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Reach?
Not having to burden our Sales Development team to drive event registrations

What do you dislike about Reach?
Would like to be able to dial up and down the number of events we can promote instead of flat number of events per time period

What problems is Reach solving and how is that benefiting you?
* Low webinar attendance
* No incentive for SDRs to drive webinar attendance
* Promoting multiple events at once

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about Reach?
review_question_answers.answer: Not having to burden our Sales Development team to drive event registrations

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about Reach?

review_question_answers.question: What problems is Reach solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer:
* Low webinar attendance
* No incentive for SDRs to drive webinar attendance
* Promoting multiple events at once

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Reach?
It gives me another channel to secure qualified event attendees outside of my core sales and SDR team.

What do you dislike about Reach?
They don't collect mailing addresses for registrants to virtual field events that require shipments.

What problems is Reach solving and how is that benefiting you?
I built out my virtual field event program with Banzai, and Banzai filled them with qualified leads.

review_question_answers.answer: I built out my virtual field event program with Banzai, and Banzai filled them with qualified leads.

initial_reviews.review_title: Why to Go for Banzai Reach
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Reach?
The tremendous amount of virtual reach we get on this platform.A solution built to resolve the problems we face in the modern market.

What do you dislike about Reach?
First, the customer service is horrible. In two years, they have had multiple account managers who made promises they couldn't keep.

Recommendations to others considering Reach:
Can do better with customer services and reaching out to people who are looking to increase their outsourcing for content.

What problems is Reach solving and how is that benefiting you?
Boosting Attendance at B2B Events for our company products.
